legend.span: Select FP update you want to make.

fieldset.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/ecp_group/ecp_message
fieldset.span: Instructions: Tell the couple to select a long-lasting FP method. When couple is ready, open a new Family Planning form.

legend.span: You are at the start of MEC family planning wheel.
Does the couple want more children?
To check if migraine has aura, ask this question: 'Do you see bright spot in your vision before bad headaches?'
Multiple risk factors include older age, smoking, diabetes, and hypertension
You selected HIV/AIDS. Is the woman sickly or doing well?
Has woman had diabetes for > 20 years or has a complicated case of diabetes?
Does her Antiretroviral Therapy contain the drug ritonavir?
If unsure, ask to see the drug packaging.

fieldset.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/use_message
fieldset.span:
Instructions:
can use following methods: Condom

fieldset.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/generally_use_message
fieldset.span:
Instructions: If other methods are not appropriate,
can use following methods:

fieldset.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/not_recommended_message
fieldset.span:
Instructions:
should not use following methods, unless no other options are available:

fieldset.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/dont_use_message
fieldset.span:
Instructions:
should not use following methods:

legend.span: Which method will the couple accept?

fieldset.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/male_sterilizaton_group/male_sterilization_message
fieldset.span: Instructions: Pregnancy can still happen up to 3 mos. after male sterilization. Tell couple to use back-up FP method until 3 mos. from sterilization date:

label.span: Date the couple will start new supply?

input.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/ocp_dont_use
input.data-calculate: if(selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/cancers, 'breast') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/heart_blood, 'hypertension_160_100') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/heart_blood, 'deep_vein_thrombosis') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/heart_blood, 'cardiovascular_disease') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/head, 'migraine_aura') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/diseases, 'liver_disease') or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/diabetes_complications = 'yes' or (/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/sixmos_from_delivery_date = 'yes' and /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/currently_breastfeeding = 'yes'), 'OCP', '')

input.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/ocp_not_recommended
input.data-calculate: if(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/ocp_dont_use = '' and (/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/smokes_tobacco_over_35 != '' or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/heart_blood, 'hypertension_140_90') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/drug_interactions, 'rifampicin_rifabutin') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/drug_interactions, 'anticonvulsants') or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/no_aura_over_35 != '' or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/arv_therapy = 'yes'), 'OCP', '')

input.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/ocp_generally_use
input.data-calculate: if(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/ocp_dont_use = '' and /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/ocp_not_recommended = '' and (selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/cancers, 'cervical') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/urinary_reproductive, 'cervical_intraepithelial_neoplasia') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/urinary_reproductive, 'unexplained_vaginal_bleeding') or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/smokes_tobacco_under_35 != '' or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/diseases, 'diabetes') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/drug_interactions, 'arv_therapy') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/heart_blood, 'obese') or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/forty_or_over != '' or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/no_aura_under_35 != ''), 'OCP', '')

input.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/dmpa_not_recommended
input.data-calculate: if(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/dmpa_dont_use = '' and (selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/deep_vein_thrombosis, 'acute') or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/acute_deep_vein_thrombosis = 'no' or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/heart_blood, 'cardiovascular_disease') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/liver_disease, 'tumor') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/urinary_reproductive, 'unexplained_vaginal_bleeding') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/heart_blood, 'hypertension_160_100')), 'DMPA', '')

input.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/dmpa_generally_use
input.data-calculate: if(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/dmpa_dont_use = '' and /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/dmpa_not_recommended = '' and (selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/deep_vein_thrombosis, 'history') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/deep_vein_thrombosis, 'prolonged_immobilization_surgery') or (selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/deep_vein_thrombosis, 'acute') and /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/acute_deep_vein_thrombosis = 'yes') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/head, 'migraine_aura') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/diseases, 'diabetes') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/drug_interactions, 'arv_therapy') or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/under_18 != '' or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/fortyfive_or_over != '' or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/cancers, 'cervical') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/urinary_reproductive, 'cervical_intraepithelial_neoplasia') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/heart_blood, 'hypertension_140_90')), 'DMPA', '')

input.name: /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/iud_generally_use
input.data-calculate: if(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/iud_dont_use = '' and /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/iud_not_recommended = '' and (selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/drug_interactions, 'arv_therapy') or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/under_18 != '' or /EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/nulliparous != '' or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/stis, 'other_stis_and_vaginitis') or selected(/EC_New_Family_Planning_v7_01_Copy/change_fp_method_group/mec_wheel_group/stis, 'hiv_aids')), 'IUD', '')
